html:
9.4.23  1:19 am   i want to write a comic but im a bit stuck coming up with designs and names for all the characters and places i need. is there any wurtzian wisdom that can save me in my hour of need?

      just try doing it without that stuff

9.4.23  12:48 am   Dear William,

     Do you ever feel like you have yourself and everything else "figured out", and then some random event causes you to reconsider your entire mindset and direction of thinking?

     i'm aware that the 'figured out' state doesn't last more than a couple of moments

          If so, do you think my tie looks nice or should I wear the blue one instead?

     i can't see it from here

     Your friend,
Eddie Van Halen

9.3.23  11:44 pm   is the name of your next planned video something along the lines of "teach me about the moon"?

      no

9.3.23  10:22 pm   I keep coming back to this website, to read most of the questions. Is this concerning?

      no

9.3.23  9:56 pm   can i trust a grain of sand

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

9.3.23  8:20 pm   does the "i'm feeling randy" button have a name?

     sure

     if so, is it randy?

     'random'

9.3.23  1:08 pm   I've been writing various texts about philosophy and the human mind, so, you would really help me out if you answered this question. are croquettes better than nuggets?

      they are exactly the same

9.3.23  12:36 pm   how to deal with unwanted thoughts?

      start thinking about the thoughts you want

9.3.23  9:45 am   what should i name my pet banana?

      banana 1

9.3.23  2:11 am   are you an epic absurd man?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

9.3.23  1:01 am   Is a barber just a hair surgeon?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

9.2.23  11:22 pm   favourite element

      the first one

9.2.23  11:19 pm   do you like physics

      yes

9.2.23  6:55 pm   What was it like on your home planet? 

      hot/cold

9.2.23  3:32 pm   Opinion on milk

      improbable

9.2.23  1:34 pm   why do you want this job

      why do YOU want it

9.2.23  1:00 pm   Hey bill, I was in history class the other day and we were learning about the indus river valley civilization and I was like "oh hey bill wurtz said that disappeared" so I said in class "didn't that disappear" and my teacher thinks I'm smart now, can you give me another history tip? 

      delaware was swedish for like 5 minutes

9.2.23  11:18 am   how to start chilling on a hot day

      do this weird trick, and by weird trick i don't mean the thing shown in the picture. what you're actually supposed to do is click into the click vortex, which of course has nothing to do with your question

9.2.23  11:09 am   when and why did the 15-stack become the 11-stack?

      i mis-counted

9.2.23  10:50 am   I'm the guy who threw the shoe at bush

      i believe you

9.2.23  10:05 am   hi, i hope you are having a very good day. i am troubled because i've watched some psychology videos that talked about the 'subconscious' and they said that when people make art, it's always expressing some deep part of them they don't understand. also they talked about some older psychologists and their wild theories about the mind. anyway now i can't make art like i used to because i'm afraid to do something that might reveal some part of me to others that i don't understand, or that might mean something i don't understand. i feel out of control and scared. do you have advice or knowledge that might help me feel less scared or understand more about this?

      as long as it conveys 10 things at once then you're fine

9.2.23  9:01 am   should people fear themselves?

      maybe a couple times a week

9.2.23  7:27 am   What type of characters are your characters? Flat, Round, Static, or Dynamic?

      dynamic

9.2.23  2:57 am   what is your opinion on going on-line to surf the net?

      usually you're actually within the confines of a particular app or service

9.2.23  1:58 am   who were you trying to convince that youre not a liar in "where i've been"

      i don't recall anything like that happening in that song. although generally my goal in songs is try to give others a chance to feel some of the things i feel sometimes

9.2.23  12:02 am   think that the people who created the alphabet didn't understand what they did, and then eventually they made a system to understand something they didn't understand, and then the people that didn't understand it started using it and they understood it and suddenly now everyone understands, whats your opinion on this matter

      understanding is contagious. it happens, by any means necessary

9.1.23  10:38 pm   what is 1 mind-expanding activity that anyone can engage in from the comfort of their own home

      there are many basic things i can think of, but i hesitate to say any of them because it immediately makes me think of the possibility that someone maybe cannot do it

9.1.23  8:58 pm   How do I prevent people from getting me wrong whenever I speak about something even though I thought I've made it clear what my point was?

      everyone gets everthing wrong. however, within that, there is also room somehow for rightness to swim and float

9.1.23  8:09 pm   favorite material?

      corduroy

9.1.23  6:09 pm   what would it take for you to believe someone who said they time traveled from the distant future

      they would first need to acknowledge that there are infinite potential futures from any given vantage point. so by their interacting with the current present, that guarantees that they are 'from' a different future than the one i or anyone here will subsequently go to

9.1.23  5:38 pm   can i see what the whole restaurant from "2 friends on the beach" looks like inside?

      sure

9.1.23  5:11 pm   an emotion that I don't think has ever been expressed in music before is disgust. I mean I've heard happy music, sad music, scary music, angry music, but I don't think I have ever heard disgusted music before. How do you think this music would be achieved?

      i think nirvana has probably done it

9.1.23  4:22 pm   What was the bad thing that you did that you had to write an entire banger song about?

      choosing which song to write

9.1.23  2:13 pm   is there a way to improve sight reading quickly

      yes but you never know when it will happen. if you keep reading and listening, it will improve at some pace. sometimes fast, sometimes slow

9.1.23  10:06 am   how do i disassociate myself from my past reincarnations

      maybe change your profile picture

9.1.23  9:19 am   Tips on how to become a master of the pitch bend wheel?

      spending time with it. enjoy it

9.1.23  8:15 am   i would like to add grey keys to a piano. is this wise?

      it's wise to give it a try

9.1.23  6:06 am   is the world flat

      no, but maybe you could flatten it

9.1.23  5:07 am   do you want to become a cat

      no

9.1.23  5:07 am   i'm the one who had a dream where there was stuff like there was another me and everything was lots of fun and i went and saw the other ones and there was a little lumpy one and another windy middle one and there were things that they heard around that i knew what they were but i don't know now and then it went away

      i understand

9.1.23  1:54 am   how many back flips can you do

      i'm not sure

9.1.23  1:05 am   ok it's september. can we meet now?

      sure





PREVIOUS QUESTIONS

8.31.23  10:10 pm   bill do you like playing with balls of the bouncy sort

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

8.31.23  8:19 pm   What is your fav instrument?

      gravity

8.31.23  7:16 pm   Which whole tone scale is better, the one with C or the one with more white keys?

      each one makes the other one better. like a great relationship

8.31.23  6:55 pm   do worms die?

      i'm not sure

8.31.23  6:52 pm   what is your favourite jingle you have made

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

8.31.23  6:39 pm   what is a good song to name my child after

      mambo #5

8.31.23  5:48 pm   was your "unboxing video" an excuse to show off your cool sunglasses

     no

     if so, it worked. those are cool sunglasses.

     actually in this case, the video did serve as an excuse to use music and video presentation to make completely ordinary glasses seem cool. they were in fact the most ordinary glasses money can buy

8.31.23  4:15 pm   Would you write a book if you felt you had a pretty good story to tell?

      nowadays i use audio/visual media for storytelling
